extendedInfo.description: With E*TRADE Mobile for Android1, you can get real-time streaming quotes, place trades, manage your accounts, and moreâall from your AndroidTM-powered device. Get everything you want in a trading and investing tool, right in the palm of your hand.Place Tradesâ¢ Place trades for stocks, options, complex options, and mutual funds with just a few tapsâ¢ Set default account and order preferences for speedy order placementâ¢ Check the status of open ordersAccess Your Accountsâ¢ Monitor all of your brokerage accounts in a single viewâ¢ Receive real-time account alerts and trade confirmationsâ¢ Create and edit watch lists that stay in sync with etrade.comTrack the Marketsâ¢ View a market snapshot from Briefing.com from the dashboardâ¢ Stay informed on breaking news with RSS feeds from top sourcesâ¢ Get instant access to real-time streaming quotes and chartsResearch â¢ Use your deviceâs camera2 to scan a barcode to identify the company/symbolâ¢ Interact with landscape mode charts and EMA/SMA technical toolsManage Cashâ¢ Deposit checks remotely using your device's camera2â¢ Quick Transfer cash from any financial institution3Watch Videosâ¢ Watch live CNBC Video and Video on Demandâ¢ Learn new strategies with our mobile library of educational videos1 This app version is optimized for smartphones2 Camera permissions are strictly for the check deposit and barcode scanning features only. Your camera will not be used at any other time.3 For details and important information about Quick Transfer, please visit www.etrade.com/quicktransferdetails for a listing of the limitations, restriction, and time deadlines associated with the service.View End-user License Agreement: https://mobile.etrade.com/etmobile/EULA_1.0.html

reviews.title: Freezes when using menu
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this app over the past few updates or so. The latest one has a bug in the menu where, once logged in, clicking menu will flash the screen then stay in a \"loading\" dialogue until I kill the app.
reviews.author: Andrew Mitchell

reviews.title: Logs out
reviews.comment: Every time I click on anything I have to reenter my password. Very admitting and freezes up on different functions
reviews.author: Kirk Haley

reviews.title: Good for what it does
reviews.comment: Lacks some functionality that I would like to see added like some auto risk mitigaters, and top gainers/lossers of the day week and month etc. hope that when they roll out there forex platform they push it down to the app. Then I would be set.
reviews.author: matt mudman

reviews.title: Mobile Deposit Fail!
reviews.comment: Mobile deposit worked better in prior versions of this app.  With every update it has gotten worse.
reviews.author: Kamron Lessani

reviews.title: Spy
reviews.comment: Why does it need to read the identity of the phone calls I make?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App!!!!
reviews.comment: I want to buy stock in the company that made this App.  Seriously!
reviews.author: Kevin Nelson

reviews.title: Fully featured
reviews.comment: So far it does exactly what I want.
reviews.author: Bill Peckham

reviews.title: mobile deposit!
reviews.comment: Much better with update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not optimized for Nexus 10
reviews.comment: While working great for my phone (GS3), it doesn\'t work well for my Nexus 10. The app is not optimized for landscape mode.
reviews.author: Hachi Adachi

reviews.title: Investing made easy!?
reviews.comment: How to Invest the best to Invest it\'s all here with this Investers guide for Dummies.
reviews.author: lawrence cantrell

reviews.title: Good app, but not perfect.
reviews.comment: Everything\'s great but I\'d like chart to be adopted for penny stocks too.
reviews.author: Dmitry Merenkov

reviews.title: Good & getting better.
reviews.comment: I would like to see % G/L since purchased for individual stocks in the portfolio
reviews.author: Robert Dall

reviews.title: Crashing hard after 8.2.1 update
reviews.comment: The change $ is changing into the stock price after one up or down movement! NEED FIX NOW!
reviews.author: Sam Goljahi

reviews.title: Trade on the road with this app
reviews.comment: Able to trade while on the move. Good app.
reviews.author: Mohit Kalra

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Loved it
reviews.author: Darrell Purdie

reviews.title: Don\'t upgrade
reviews.comment: <sarcasm> You guys are geniuses.  </sarcasm>
reviews.author: Lorin Johnson

reviews.title: Getting better
reviews.comment: Works fine and is getting better.  However the cnbc video crashes about every 90 seconds.  Forcing a restart.
reviews.author: Brendan Teeley

reviews.title: Permissions Bloat
reviews.comment: The app now requires the permission for \"phone status and ID\".  I don\'t understand why the app would need such information.  Seems like permissions bloat.
reviews.author: Teague Costas

reviews.title: Bad update
reviews.comment: I received an Invalid file error every time I tried to update. So, I uninstalled and tried to re-install it and now I can\'t even do that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is tough to design
reviews.comment: The app does what it should do and does it well. You can watch your portfolio, pull triggers if necessary, and transfer funds. You cant expect a desktop experience on a 4.5 inch screen. Other trading apps are way worse. I wish that the research section didn\'t give me these unusable pdfs for the market analysts take.
reviews.author: Andrew Entin
